title: Ep 79: Positive Thinking with Makeup Artist Sonia Kashuk
itunes:title: Ep 79: Positive Thinking with Makeup Artist Sonia Kashuk
itunes:subtitle: Makeup artist Sonia Kashuk discusses her 17-year run with Target, why she uses three eye creams at once, and how having breast cancer affected her career—and her life. Plus, in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, we chat about our favorite pink...
description:
Makeup artist Sonia Kashuk discusses her 17-year run with Target, why she uses three eye creams at once, and how having breast cancer affected her career—and her life. Plus, in honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, we chat about our favorite pink products and share Dr. Heidi Waldorf's tips for dealing with skin issues caused by the disease.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
